document_data.name: Bane Weapon
document_data.mainbody: '''''Bane weapon''''' was a [[transmutation]] [[spell]] that applied the ''[[Bane (property)|bane]]'' quality to a given [[weapon]] or bundle of projectiles, causing them to strike with greater precision and inflict more damage upon a certain type of creatures. The types of beings chosen in this manner included broad groups such as [[fey]], [[aberration]]s, specific [[humanoid]]s, [[magical beast]]s or [[undead]], among many others.{{Cite dragon/279/Revenge of the Spider Queen}}
document_data.Components: The casting of this spell required [[verbal]] and [[somatic component]]s.
